Text:
Fantastic compilation.

fully tagged, I appreciate that.  I tried finding this collection on CD but it is now rare and some are charging over $80 per cd for it. fuck that.
danelectro, congrats on uploading IMHO the best music torrent ever!! Been looking for these for ever!!!

I'm glad you all enjoyed it, keep rocking =)

I usually release my stuff at...

poeiradiscos dot blogspot dot com

so stay tuned!
Great bands, great collection, great fucking torrent. Thanks Dano!
I originally got drawn to this set for having the original version of "Shombalor" by Sherriff & the Revells but there's more to this...sooo much more. Thanks!

Thanks for sharing this awesome set, I have the first two albums on vinyl but never saw the rest in the record shop.
Any chance of uploading this set as FLAC files?

Great stuff!!! Thnx a million. I only had Vol. 1 on lp. So happy with these 6.

Got by any chance Desperate Rock and Roll?? (i got 15 volumes on lp) or Sin Alley (i only have part 1 and 3).

Thnx again, and a great rockin' 2012!!

TCB
